product_name: Saris Axis Steel 3 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: Ruggedly built and very lightweight, the stylish Saris Axis Steel 3 bike hitch rack carries 3 bikes, tilts down to allow rear vehicle access and weighs just 16 lbs. to make it easy to install. Frame is constructed of durable steel and fits both 2 and 1.25 in. hitch sizes. Arms feature integrated hold downs and ratcheting, anti-sway straps to secure and stabilize bikes. Frame tilts down for easy access to trunk or rear of vehicle; bikes must be removed to use tilting feature. The Saris Axis Steel 3 bike hitch rack carries 3 bikes up to 35 lbs. each. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: Ruggedly built and very lightweight, the stylish Saris Axis Steel 3 bike hitch rack carries 3 bikes, tilts down to allow rear vehicle access and weighs just 16 lbs. to make it easy to install.
